Hello lovely people of Food Tube I must have
made hundred times the classic pasta pesto

but let me show you have to make aubergine

you can see I have 3 beautiful aubergines

which you cut them in half so simple so easy
to do it there it goes and cut the other one

but then you need to use a blend of olive
oil and butter which you get some on your

palette knife or a knife or a brush and just
go round nicely that's all you need just a

little bit then you cut them length way that
means this way ok then you cut it and then

you put it down nicely don't go over the skin
like this one because if you go over the skin

you can't cook them out properly let's put
them in the oven, you need to put them in

180, one eight zero, oh yes and this is one

I made earlier on because you need to cool
down because if they're too how you'll burn

yourself you can't really scoop 'em out so

stage with your knife chop them all up

now let's go straight to pestle and mortar

handful of toasted almonds straight inside
this is the main tool but also this gives

now I need to put a little bit of pecorino

a bit now I'm gonna have a little blend of

cut them in half remove the seeds because
